meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Knicks-Pacers Series at 2-2 Larry Johnson's shooting propelled the injury-plagued Knicks to a 91-89 victory over the Indiana Pacers.
U.S. Criticizes Peru's Vote Sunday's presidential election, held without opposition, was undemocratic and the result illegitimate, an American official said.
Knicks-Pacers Series at 2-2 Larry Johnson's shooting propelled the injury-plagued Knicks to a 91-89 victory over the Indiana Pacers.
U.S. Criticizes Peru's Vote Sunday's presidential election, held without opposition, was undemocratic and the result illegitimate, an American official said.
House Arrest for Suharto The Indonesian government placed former President Suharto under house arrest as it sought to try him on corruption charges.
Sampras Falls in First Round Pete Sampras was eliminated early in the French Open again, as Mark Philippoussis won their match in five sets.
